name: Blood Entropy
description:
You have to plan the best strategy to eliminate all the servant of the Evil lord.

But beware, the Evil lord connected the souls of your units in three groups. You can't tell your commands for individual units.

Choose the right Action cards and place them on the command slots. Then, end your turn and prepare for the worst.

(Note: You can see the attack patterns of the enemies and your units if you hover the mouse over them)
